title: Seen and heard
creator_credit: Colin South, Media World and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Aimed at students by encouraging them to participate in school councils and student representative councils, shows how to run meetings, procedures etc. and how students can be more effective in them. Part of the Participation and Equity Program.
